title: btw I'm pretty sure J4 is broken
body: Not in like, an OP way, but I mean like, bugged. The last game I played, my ult played up on two instances. The first time, I used it, there was no damage, no terrain, no jump, no animation, NOTHING, but I DID press R and it DID go on cooldown. The second time, into the late game, I used it, it worked as normal, but this time it DIDN'T go on Cooldown and I was able to use it literally immediately after.

replies.body:
See if you can re-create it in a custom just to make sure it isn't a one game/lag kind of thing.

If you can, check [over on this board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report), and check if it has been described. If not, feel free to add it to the list :D

Remember to [adhere to the proper protocol](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) when doing so ♥
that no cd was obviously a make up for the cd... obviously riot felt bad.
